summary:
This ENB is designed to use with COT 3.1 and Realistic Lighting Overhaul 4.07c. 

Please, check requirements and load order...
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][font=Impact]-- T ENB --[/size][/font]


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/38410-1-1374008686.png[/img]


[font=Impact][size=5][u]Requirements:[/u][/size][/font]

1. First download the ENB binary (0.200/0.201, wrapper version) from enbdev.com and install into your Skyrim directory.
[url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]Click here!
[/url]
2. Extract T ENB into your skyrim Directory > overwrite 

3. (SKIP THIS IF YOU WANT USE MY INI-SETTINGS)
   Set in SkyrimPrefs.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
   bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 
   bTreesReceiveShadows=1
   bDrawLandShadows=1
   bShadowsOnGrass=1 

Better DOF:
   bDoDepthOfField=1
   iRadialBlurLevel=2

4. Then download and install Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting 3.1
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Click here![/url]

5. After that download and install Realistic lighting overhaul 4.07c
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450//?]Click here![/url]

6. Finally install these mods (to balance lighting) real rain COT, Real Effect Candle (softer version), Less Intrusive Candle Light Spell (textures only), fixed eye adaption, Climates Of Tamriel - Weather Patch - Fog Rain Overcast,[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16541//?]Click here![/url] , [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7643] Link![/url] , [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5297]Link![/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8149]Link![/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39799//?]Link![/url]

NVIDIA users: 320.49 drivers or newer highly recommended.

7. (OPTIONAL) 
Back up your skyrim.ini and SkyrimPrefs.ini first then use mine.
Set in SkyrimPrefs.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
sD3DDevice=\"Copy this line from your old SkyrimPrefs.ini  \"
iSize W=Copy this line from your old SkyrimPrefs.ini
iSize H=Copy this line  from your old SkyrimPrefs.ini

Set in Skyrim.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
uGridsToLoad=

Copy this line from your old skyrim.ini

[font=Impact][size=5][u]Highly recommended mods:[/u][/size][/font]

Skyrim HD textures DLC

Further Dark Dungeons for ENB (check load order)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12454]Link![/url]

Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655/?]Link![/url]

Real Effect Candle (softer version)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7643]Link![/url]

Less Intrusive Candle Light Spell (textures only)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5297]Link![/url]

Pure Waters
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111//?]Link![/url] 

Enhanced Night Skyrim (blue galaxy)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85]Link![/url]

Skyrim Flora Overhaul
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141]Link![/url]

Lush Grass
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32246//?]Link![/url]

Book of silence
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909//?]Link![/url]

Moss rocks
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31856//?]Link![/url]

[size=4][b][u]Load order:[/u][/b][/size]

ClimatesOfTamriel.esm
Fixed EyeAdaption.esp
RealRainCot.esp
Realistic Lighting Overhaul - Dungeons.esp
Further Dark Dungeons for ENB.esp
Realistic Lighting Overhaul - Dawnguard Interiors.esp
Realistic Lighting Overhaul - Major City Interiors.esp
Realistic Lighting Overhaul - Minor Cities and Town Interiors.esp
RLO - Adaptive Interiors Vanilla Weathers Patch.esp
ClimatesOfTamriel-Dawnguard-Patch.esp
ClimatesOfTamriel-Dragonborn-Patch.esp
ClimatesOfTamriel-Nights-Level-6.esp
prod80_CoT_patch.esp

Credits:

Boris Vorontsov (ENB Series)

mindflux + polo (particle patch)
Matso (Custom Depth of Field, Bloom shader)
Tapioks (Custom Depth of Field)
Kyokushinoyama (sun sprite)
LucidAPs
author: Obliver
